subject: Invitation to Interview for Marketing Coordinator Role at NovaTech Inc
body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for your interest in the Marketing Coordinator position at NovaTech Inc. We were impressed with your skills and experience, and we'd like to invite you to participate in an interview.

The interview is scheduled for Wednesday, March 20 at 2:00 PM EST and will be conducted via Skype. You will be meeting with Rachel Lee, Director of Marketing, who will discuss the role, team, and expectations.

Please let us know if this date and time work for you, or feel free to suggest alternative availability.

Best regards,
Olivia Brown
Recruiting Coordinator
NovaTech Inc
intent: Invite the candidate to interview and confirm availability
